data.title: Bigg Boss Winners List of All Seasons 1 to 17 | Prize-Money 2024
data.meta_description: Bigg Boss Winners List of All Seasons. Bigg Boss Show completed its 17 Shows. Seasons 1 Winner Rahul Roy. Also, Check Bigg boss OTT Seasons.
data.text:
Bigg Boss, the Indian reality TV show, has a huge fan base. The show has completed sixteen seasons successfully and started in 2006. The show has gained massive popularity all over the world. Because of this, the Bigg Boss franchise started this show in other languages. Many popular celebrities have participated in this show throughout the journey. Shilpa Shetty hosted season 2, while season 3 was hosted by Amitabh Bachchan. Here is the Bigg Boss winners list of all seasons with the year of participation and prize money they won. Also, Check Bigg Boss OTT Winners list and Contestants below.

Bigg Boss Winners List of All Seasons From 2006-2024

Winner(s)Season/ YearPrize MoneyRunnerUp(s) Rahul Roy(2006–07) 1₹1 croreCarol Gracias Ashutosh Kaushik(2008) 2₹1 croreRaja Chaudhary Vindu Dara Singh(2009) 3₹1 crorePravesh Rana Shweta Tiwari(2010–11)4₹1 croreDalip Singh Rana aka The Great Khali Juhi Parmar(2011–12)5₹1 croreMahek Chahal Urvashi Dholakia(2012–13)6₹50 lakhImam Siddique Gauahar Khan(2013) 7₹50 lakhTanishaa Mukerji Gautam Gulati(2014–15)8₹50 lakhKarishma Tanna, Preetam Singh Prince Narula(2015–16)9₹50 lakhRishabh Sinha Manveer Gurjar(2016–17)10₹50 lakhBani Judge Shilpa Shinde(2017–18)11₹44 lakhHina Khan Dipika Kakar(2018)12₹30 lakhS. Sreesanth Sidharth Shukla(2019–20)13₹50 lakhAsim Riaz Rubina Dilaik(2020–21)14₹36 lakhRahul Vaidya Tejasswi Prakash(2021–22)15₹40 lakhPratik Sehajpal MC Stan(2022–23)16₹31.8 lakhShiv Thakare Munawar Faruqui(2023–24)17₹50 lakhAbhishek Kumar

Table Of Contents – Bigg Boss Winners of All Seasons

Rahul Roy

Ashutosh Kaushik

Bigg Boss Winners List of All Seasons | Year & Prize Money (Hindi Reality Show)

1. Rahul Roy – Bigg Boss Winner

Prize Money: 1 Crore

Runner Up: Carol Gracias

Year: 2006

Hosted by Arshad Warsi

Aashiqui, the 90s musical amorous hit Rahul Roy, was the inaugural season’s Bigg Boss winner. He owns Rahul Roy Studios, which produced its debut film, Elaan, on November 25, 2011. Rahul was most recently seen in the 2019 drama television series thriller Cabaret. He survived a brain stroke while filming his movie LAC in Nov 2020, yet he is back in the industry.

2. Ashutosh Kaushik

Prize Money: 1 Crore

Runner Up: Raja Chaudhary

Year- 2008

Hosted By Shilpa Shetty

Ashutosh Kaushik was initially featured in the TV reality program MTV Roadies in 2007; he ended up winning the contest. After Bigg Boss 2, he appeared in several Bollywood films. Laal Rang in 2016 was the last movie he had done. He has filed a petition in the Delhi High Court, requesting that all videos and publications about him be removed since they are causing him emotional suffering.

Also Read: RIVA ARORA AGE, HEIGHT, MOVIES, EDUCATION, AND AFFAIRS

3. Vindu Dara Singh

Prize Money: 1 crore

Runner Up: Pravesh Rana

Year- 2009

Hosted By Amitabh Bachchan

Dara Singh Randhawa, the former Indian wrestler, and actor, is the father of Vindu Dara Singh. Vindu began his career as an actor in Karan (1994). He was the third season champion of Bigg Boss in 2009. He was working in the TV business and was featured as a companion of Rakhi Sawant in season 14 of Bigg Boss last year.

Also Read: MC STAN AGE, HEIGHT, GIRLFRIEND NAME, MC STAN REAL NAME & DOB

4. Shweta Tiwari

Prize Money: 1 crore

Runner Up: Dalip Singh Rana (The Great Khali)

Bigg Boss Winner at Year- 2010-2011

Hosted by Salman Khan

Shweta Tiwari is most recognized for her role in ‘Kasautii Zindagi Kay’ as Prerna Sharma. She has starred in various TV serials following Bigg Boss, including Bal Veer, Rangoli, Begusarai, and others, as well as non-fictional shows such as Jhalak Dikhla Jaa 6, India’s leading Dancer. She is presently a competitor in the reality program Khatron Ke Khiladi 11. Shweta and her second husband, Abhinav Kohli, divorced in 2019 after she lodged a domestic abuse case against him.

Check Now

5. Juhi Parmar

Prize Money: 1 crore

Runner Up: Mahek Chahal

Year- 2011-2012

Hosted by Sanjay Dutt and Salman Khan

Juhi Parmar rose to prominence as the star of the program Kumkum- Ek Pyara Sa Bandhan. She featured in various television series after winning Bigg Boss Season 5, like F.I.R, Tantra, Santoshi Maa, and others. She last appeared on Hamari Wali Good News, which ended in August 2021.

6. Urvashi Dholakia – Bigg Boss Season 6 winner

Prize Money: 50 Lakh

Runner Up: Imam Siddique

Bigg Boss Winner at Year- 2012-2013

Hosted by Salman Khan

Shrikant, Urvashi Dholakia’s first television serial, was broadcast on Doordarshan in 1987. She rose to prominence after winning Bigg Boss Season 6; following that, she landed another major project in the television series Chandrakanta – Ek Mayavi Prem Gaatha, which ran until 2018. She made a guest appearance on Bigg Boss 13. She married at the tender age of 17 after being born in 1978 to a Gujarati father.

7. Gauahar Khan – Bigg Boss Winner, prize & year

Prize Money: 50 Lakh

Runner Up: Tanishaa Mukerji

Year- 2013

Hosted by Salman Khan

Gauahar Khan has appeared in several films following Bigg Boss, including Badrinath ki Dulhania, Begum Jaan, Fever, Tera Intezaar, and 14 Phere, which aired on July 23, 2021. She is engaged with social media and frequently tweets about Bigg Boss. She began her modeling business. She has performed several item numbers for Bollywood, and her debut film as a debutante was “Rocket Singh: Salesman of the Year,” produced by Yash Raj Productions.

8. Gautam Gulati

Prize Money: 50 Lakh

Runner Up: Karishma Tanna

Year- 2014-2015

Hosted by Salman Khan

Gautam Gulati, the Season 8 winner of Bigg Boss. He has done various roles in television and film after winning the reality show. Gautam played the lead in the 2019 online series Cobra. He will host the television show “Mujhse Shaadi Karogi” in 2020. He recently appeared in the film Radhe alongside Salman Khan. He is rumored to be working on a film with Ayushmann Khurrana called “Chandigarh Kare Aashiqui” shortly.

Check Now

9. Prince Narula

Prize Money: 50 Lakh

Runner Up: Rishabh Sinha

Year- 2015-2016

Hosted by Salman Khan

Prince Narula is from the Indian city of Chandigarh. He is renowned as the “King of Reality Programs” after demonstrating effectiveness in reality series in a row, “MTV Roadies 12,” “Bigg Boss 9,” “MTV Splitsvilla 8,” and “Nach Baliye 9.” On October 12, 2018, Prince wedded his lover, TV actress Yuvika Chaudhary. She was a contestant on Bigg Boss 9.

Following Bigg Boss, Prince Narula worked on an assortment of major projects. In 2019, he was the main character in the Bombers web series. He is also attempting to get into the music industry with hits such as Hey Hello (2017), Burnout (2018), and Jai Veeru (2019). Since 2016, he has been the primary commander of MTV Roadies.

10. Manveer Gurjar

Prize Money: 50 Lakh

Runner Up: Bani J

Year- 2016-2017

Hosted by Salman Khan

Winner of Bigg Boss 10, he is famous for being an outspoken man who speaks his mind. This is how he portrayed himself on Bigg Boss. Manoj Kumar Baisoya is the real name of Manveer Gurjar. Manveer had reverted to his family’s agricultural business after completing the reality program. According to media reports, he has also decided to join AAP. He is also striving to get better for the Gurjar minority in India.

11. Shilpa Shinde

Prize Money: 50 Lakh

Runner Up: Hina Khan

Year- 2017-2018

Hosted by Salman Khan

Shilpa Shinde was born in 1977 to a Maharashtrian family. Her dad was a Supreme Court justice. After abruptly leaving her former blockbuster program ‘Bhabhi Ji Ghar Par Hai,’ she entered Bigg Boss to clear up any misunderstandings about herself. Shilpa Shinde is known as Angoori bhabhi for his show before Bigg Boss. In 2019, she rejoined the political party Congress. She was most recently featured as Queen Meerawati in the ALT Balaji new show Paurashpur (2020).

12. Dipika Kakar

Prize Money: 30 Lakh

Runner Up: S. Sreesanth

Year- Dec 2018

Hosted by Salman Khan

Dipika Kakar was born in the Indian city of Pune. She is mainly known for the Tv program “Sasural Simar Ka” as Simar in all houses. She divorced Raunak Samson, her first husband, in 2015 and remarried in February 2018 to TV actor and co-star of her old program, Shoaib Ibrahim. She switched her name to Faiza after marrying and embracing Islam.

She recently made a guest appearance in the television drama Sasural Simar Ka 2. She has a YouTube channel named “Dipika Ki Duniya,” where she informs her admirers daily.

13. Sidharth Shukla

Prize Money: 50 Lakh

Runner Up: Asim Riaz

Year- 2019-2020

Hosted by Salman Khan

Sidharth Shukla was a Mumbai-born model, actor, and presenter. After winning Bigg Boss 13 in 2019-20, he starred in two live performances, “Dil Ko Karaar Aya” and “Shona Shona,” sung by Neha Kakkar. He played the main character in the online series “Broke But Beautiful 3.” (2021). He has also appeared in films such as “Humpty Sharma Ki Dulhan” and “Business In Kazakhstan.”

He became the initial Asian to win the World’s Best Model competition in 2005, defeating 40 other contestants. He had a heart attack on September 2nd and was transported to Cooper Hospital in Bombay, where doctors proclaimed him dead.

You May Like: MTV ROADIES WINNER LIST & PRICE MONEY OF ALL SEASONS

14. Rubina Dilaik – Bigg Boss 14 winner

Prize Money: 36 Lakh

Runner Up: Rahul Vaidya

Year- 2020-2021

Hosted by Salman Khan

Rubina Dilaik began her acting career in 2008 with the Chotti Bahu serial. In 2018, she wedded Bollywood actor Abhinav Shukla, who had previously been a Bigg Boss 14 competitor. She starred in 3 music videos after Bigg Boss: “Marjaneya,” “Galat,” and “Tumse Pyar Hai.” In 2020, she was named the tenth most desirable lady on television by The Times. Her impending Bollywood debut “Ardh” poster was just unveiled by her. She beat out 50 other females in the appearance test to secure her initial Bollywood project.

15. Tejasswi Prakash

Prize Money: 40 Lakh

Runner Up: Pratik Sehajpal

Year- 2021-2022

Hosted by Salman Khan

The Bigg Boss 15 winner Tejasswi Prakash is a well-known personality on Indian television; she played Naagin in Ekta Kapoor’s prolific serial series. In the sixth season of Naagin, she won Rs 40 lakh. The season was fortunate for her since she met and fell in love with Karan Kundra within the house.

16. MC Stan – Bigg boss 16 Winner

Prize Money: 31 Lakh

Runner Up: Shiv Thakare

Year- 2022-2023

Hosted By Salman Khan

The program began with 16 competitors. On the 68th day, Vikkas Manaktala joined the Bigg Boss home as a tiebreaker entry. However, he didn’t last long and was eliminated on the 90th day. The program concluded on February 12th, 2023, with MC Stan taking home the prize and an i10 Nios automobile.

17. Munawar Faruqui – Bigg boss 17 Winner

Munawar Faruqui Won the title of Bigg Boss 17. As we show the top finalists Munawar Faruqui, Mannara Chopra, Ankita Lokhande, and Abhishek Kumar. All Contestent played very well. But the king is Munawar who played very fabulous game in season 17. And he was rewarded with a cash prize of 50 Lakhs and took home a Hyundai Creta Car.

Who is Munawar Faruqui?

Munawar Faruqui is a famous Stand-up comedian, He was born on 28 January 1992 in Junagadh, Gujarat, His childhood was very struggle. In 5th standard, he left his school due to financial issues. He used to work in a gift shop to meet daily needs. When he was 14 years old his mother died ( Suicide). Then he moved to Mumbai his Aunt’s home. In 2020, Due to paralysis, his father passed away in 2020. His turning point was when uploaded a standup comedy video named “Dawood, Yamraaj & Aurat” on his channel which earned so much popularity.

Bigg Boss OTT Winner List All Season

Bigg Boss is India’s biggest TV reality show, which has successfully completed 17 seasons so far. After the immense success and fame of the TV version of Bigg Boss, the makers had decided to launch a new variation of it and finally, they came up with its OTT (Over the Top) version. The first Bigg Boss OTT started in 2021 and became very popular due to the power of social media and easy accessibility to watch. Till date, two successful seasons of this show have been released and finally, its third season is being telecast these days. If you have recently started watching Bigg Boss OTT and are curious to know about the previous two winners, as well as which contestants are participating in the third season, then this information is for you! Let’s delve into the Bigg Boss OTT Winner List All Season.

Complete information on Big Boss OTT Winner List All Season

1. Bigg Boss OTT Winner – Season 1

Bigg Boss: OTT Season 1 was the official first season of India’s reality digital series Bigg Boss OTT. Premiered on Voot, hosted by Karan Johar, the finale was won by Divya Agarwal after defeating 13 contestants like Shamita, Nishant, Neha, Muskan,k, and others. Born on 4 December 1992, Divya participated in MTV India’s Splitsvilla 10, Ace of Space 1, and eventually reached Bigg Boss OTT.

Prize Money: Rs 25 Lakh + OTT Edition Trophy

Runner Up: Nishant Bhat

Year: 2021 (8 August 2021 to 18 September 2021)

Hosted by: Karan Johar

2. Big Boss OTT Winner – Season 2

Elvish Yadav, also known as Siddharth Yadav, won the winner’s trophy of Bigg Boss OTT Season 2. Premiered on JioCinema, the season was hosted by Salman Khan and was his first time as the host of the OTT version. It was one of the most popular and successful seasons of OTT+TV combined. Season 2 featured 15 housemates – of which Elvish was the winner, Abhishek was first, Manisha second, Babika third, and Puja was the fourth runner-up.

Prize Money: Rs 25 Lakh + OTT Edition Trophy

Runner Up: Abhishek

Year: 2023 (17 June 2023 to 14 August 2023)

Hosted: Salmaan Khan

3. Big Boss OTT Winner – Not Announced Yet

Bigg Boss season 2 is back, but unfortunately without Salman Khan. Anil Kapoor is the host of this season. Like every season, this year too, the OTT version is back with lots of twists, action, plans, plotting, strategies, and turns. Starting from June 21 (Friday), the show is airing only on JioCinema Premium. This season features many influencers, TV actors, musicians, newsmakers, and other celebrities. The most talked about names include Sana Sultan, Vishal Pandey, Pulomi Polo Das, Chandrika Gera Dixit, Armaan Malik, and two wives – Kritika and Payal.

List of Contestants of Season 3 and their background

Sai Ketan Rao – He is a versatile actor and TV star who has appeared in the Hindi and Telugu industries. Sai has also worked in web series in several languages.

Sana Sultan – Sana worked as a model before becoming a content creator on TikTok. She has also worked in Punjabi music videos. Known for her Urdu speaking style, Sana has gained a lot of popularity.

Chandrika Dixit – Known as Vada Pav Girl, Chandrika is from New Delhi, India. Her video went viral on social media, and after that, she became an internet sensation and now she is in the Bigg Boss house.

Poulomi Polo Das – Hailing from Kolkata, Paulomi started her career as a model and she also participated in India’s Next Top Model in the year 2016. Her acting prowess and sultry appearance will surely add charm to the Big Boss OTT.

Sana Makbul – In 2009 Sana started her career as a model and participated in MTV’s Teen Diva. She was also a contestant on season 11 of Khatron Ke Khiladi.

Shivani Kumari – Shivani, a resident of a village near Auriya in UP, became famous by making reels on social media. More than 4 million people follow her on Instagram. She is famous for showing the life of her village.

Vishal Pandey – He is a Mumbai-based popular content creator. Known for his lip-sync videos, Vishal has a huge following of 9 million.

Neeraj Goyat – A mixed martial artist and boxer hailed from Haryana, Neeraj has also appeared in movies like Toofan and RRR.

Naved Shaikh – Hailed from Mumbai, Naezy or Naved is a rapper, and popular for his street hip-hop style. His street credibility and musical talent will add a unique touch to the show.

Munisha Khatwani – Tarot card reader and actress Munisha has been a part of TV shows like Tantra and Just Mohabbat. Her expertise in astrology and acting makes her a remarkable contestant.

Deepak Chaurasia – Known for his work with numerous news companies, Deepak is a senior journalist. His experience and insights in the new world will be valuable in the OTT dynamics.

Armaan Malik with two wives – Famous and sensational content creator Armaan Malik is entering the Bigg Boss house along with his wives Payal and Kritika. Together they bring an exciting dynamic to the show.

Luv Kataria – He has a massive fan base on Instagram. Luv is a model, Youtuber, entrepreneur, and actor. Popular for his prank vlogs and videos, he is having a close bond with Elvish Yadav.

Ranvir Shorey: He is a former VJ and an Indian actor who appears in Hindi TV serials and films.
